meanings.definition: Objects or decorations in the Chinese style.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with beautiful chinoiseries, from delicate vases to intricate screens.
meanings.sent2: She loved to collect chinoiseries, especially the porcelain figurines.
meanings.sent3: The chinoiseries in the shop window caught the eye of every passerby.
meanings.sent4: Her living room was a gallery of chinoiseries, transporting visitors to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The chinoiseries in the museum were so detailed, they seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: Imitation or adaptation of Chinese motifs in Western art or design.
meanings.sent1: The artist's latest painting was a beautiful blend of chinoiseries and modern elements.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer incorporated chinoiseries into the room to add an exotic touch.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer's collection featured chinoiseries with a contemporary twist.
meanings.sent4: Her tattoo sleeve was a unique mix of chinoiseries and personal symbols.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's decor was a fusion of chinoiseries and industrial design.
